@@ -4,3 +4,10 @@ members = [ "crates/*" ]
 [profile.release]
 incremental = true
 debug = true
+
+
+[patch.'crates-io']
+# https://github.com/salsa-rs/salsa/pull/75
+# and
+# https://github.com/salsa-rs/salsa/issues/99
